GiftList.Description: In time, the activity will open the prize function in addition to the regular prize!

JieRiDuoBei.Name: Joyous daemon
JieRiDuoBei.Depict: When random, daemons have the opportunity to get additional features from regular time.

JieRiDuoBei.Name: Help the Spirit Rock
JieRiDuoBei.Depict: Help to wake up the rock spirit more successfully.

JieRiDuoBei.Name: Happy birthday
